The most important thing for contributors is to understand the "pull request" workflow. We recommend doing this via the functions in the **usethis** package.

https://usethis.r-lib.org/articles/articles/pr-functions.html

But the same things can be done by hand. See here for a full discussion:

https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/GitHub-Contributing-to-a-Project


### Resources

[Pro Git](https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2). This is the best source for gaining a deeper understanding of git/Github. 

[Happy Git With R](https://happygitwithr.com/) -- For information on Git clients, see chapter 8. We recommend using GitKraken.

[Deleted files FAQ](https://www.git-tower.com/learn/git/faq/restoring-deleted-files)
